languages.text: {n}Ульфар равнодушно кивает.{/n} "Тогда оставь меня здесь и уходи. Без свидетеля не будет похорон, а значит, я останусь нести стражу над телами. Когда вернешься в обитаемые сектора Простора, передай моим братьям весть, что я жду их здесь".

{n}Ulfar nods, unconcerned.{/n} "Then leave me here and go. There will be no burial without a witness, so I will stay here to stand guard over the bodies. When you return to the inhabited sectors of the Expanse, send word to my brothers that I am waiting for them here."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар равнодушно кивает.{/n} "Тогда оставь меня здесь и уходи. Без свидетеля не будет похорон, а значит, я останусь нести стражу над телами. Когда вернешься в обитаемые сектора Простора, передай моим братьям весть, что я жду их здесь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar nods, unconcerned.{/n} "Then leave me here and go. There will be no burial without a witness, so I will stay here to stand guard over the bodies. When you return to the inhabited sectors of the Expanse, send word to my brothers that I am waiting for them here."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar nods, unconcerned.{/n} "Then leave me here and go. There will be no burial without a witness, so I will stay here to stand guard over the bodies. When you return to the inhabited sectors of the Expanse, send word to my brothers that I am waiting for them here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar nods, unconcerned.{/n} "Then leave me here and go. There will be no burial without a witness, so I will stay here to stand guard over the bodies. When you return to the inhabited sectors of the Expanse, send word to my brothers that I am waiting for them here."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法点了点头，毫不在意。{/n}“那就把我留在这里，回去吧。若是没有见证人，我的兄弟们就无法下葬，所以我要留在这里，守护他们的遗体。等你回到科罗努斯扩区之后，告诉我的兄弟们，说我在这里等着他们。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods, unconcerned.{/n} "Then leave me here and go. There will be no burial without a witness, so I will stay here to stand guard over the bodies. When you return to the inhabited sectors of the Expanse, send word to my brothers that I am waiting for them here."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法点了点头，毫不在意。{/n}“那就把我留在这里，回去吧。若是没有见证人，我的兄弟们就无法下葬，所以我要留在这里，守护他们的遗体。等你回到科罗努斯扩区之后，告诉我的兄弟们，说我在这里等着他们。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは気にした素振りもなくうなずく。{/n}「それなら俺はここに置いてお前は先に行け。証人抜きの埋葬はできん。俺はここでこいつらの遺体を守り続ける。エクスパンスの居住区域に戻ったら、俺はここで待ってると同胞に伝えてくれ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods, unconcerned.{/n} "Then leave me here and go. There will be no burial without a witness, so I will stay here to stand guard over the bodies. When you return to the inhabited sectors of the Expanse, send word to my brothers that I am waiting for them here."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは気にした素振りもなくうなずく。{/n}「それなら俺はここに置いてお前は先に行け。証人抜きの埋葬はできん。俺はここでこいつらの遺体を守り続ける。エクスパンスの居住区域に戻ったら、俺はここで待ってると同胞に伝えてくれ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar asiente, despreocupado.{/n} «Entonces déjeme aquí. Sin testigo no hay entierro, así que montaré guardia sobre sus cadáveres aquí. Cuando vuelva a los mundos habitados de la Extensión, informe a mis hermanos de que les espero aquí».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods, unconcerned.{/n} "Then leave me here and go. There will be no burial without a witness, so I will stay here to stand guard over the bodies. When you return to the inhabited sectors of the Expanse, send word to my brothers that I am waiting for them here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar asiente, despreocupado.{/n} «Entonces déjeme aquí. Sin testigo no hay entierro, así que montaré guardia sobre sus cadáveres aquí. Cuando vuelva a los mundos habitados de la Extensión, informe a mis hermanos de que les espero aquí».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar hoche la tête d'un air indifférent.{/n} « Dans ce cas, laissez-moi. Puisqu'il ne peut y avoir d'enterrement sans témoin, je resterai ici pour veiller sur leurs corps. Lorsque vous aurez regagné une zone habitée des Étendues, faites savoir à mes frères que je les attends ici. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods, unconcerned.{/n} "Then leave me here and go. There will be no burial without a witness, so I will stay here to stand guard over the bodies. When you return to the inhabited sectors of the Expanse, send word to my brothers that I am waiting for them here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar hoche la tête d'un air indifférent.{/n} « Dans ce cas, laissez-moi. Puisqu'il ne peut y avoir d'enterrement sans témoin, je resterai ici pour veiller sur leurs corps. Lorsque vous aurez regagné une zone habitée des Étendues, faites savoir à mes frères que je les attends ici. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar nickt unbeeindruckt.{/n} "Dann lasst mich hier zurück und geht. Es kann keine Bestattung ohne Zeugen geben, als werde ich hier die Leichen bewachen. Informiert nach Eurer Rückkehr in bewohnte Sektoren der Ausdehnung meine Brüder, dass ich hier auf sie warte."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods, unconcerned.{/n} "Then leave me here and go. There will be no burial without a witness, so I will stay here to stand guard over the bodies. When you return to the inhabited sectors of the Expanse, send word to my brothers that I am waiting for them here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar nickt unbeeindruckt.{/n} "Dann lasst mich hier zurück und geht. Es kann keine Bestattung ohne Zeugen geben, als werde ich hier die Leichen bewachen. Informiert nach Eurer Rückkehr in bewohnte Sektoren der Ausdehnung meine Brüder, dass ich hier auf sie warte."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, aldırış etmeden başını sallıyor.{/n} "O zaman beni burada bırakıp git. Şahit olmadan defnedilemezler. O yüzden bedenlerinin başında nöbet tutacağım. Enginlik'in nüfuslu sektörlerine ulaştığında kardeşlerime onları burada beklediğimi söyle."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar nods, unconcerned.{/n} "Then leave me here and go. There will be no burial without a witness, so I will stay here to stand guard over the bodies. When you return to the inhabited sectors of the Expanse, send word to my brothers that I am waiting for them here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, aldırış etmeden başını sallıyor.{/n} "O zaman beni burada bırak ve git. Şahit olmadan defnedilemezler. O yüzden bedenlerinin başında nöbet tutacağım. Enginlik'in yerleşim yerine yakın sektörlerine ulaştığında kardeşlerime onları burada beklediğimi söyle."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
